!! Naming

No particular naming conventions


!! Fields

A ''Task'' always has  the following fields:

* ''caption''
** A brief description of the task to be accomplished
* ''taskstatus''
** How far along the task is (chosen from the drop-down menu)
* ''resources''
** A list of resources the task can use, as links to specific tiddlers detailing them (can be as simple as a list of linked //Source//s)
* ''completed''
** If the taskstatus is "Done", the date when it was completed. 
*** IMPORTANT: a date in ''ztk'' is entered as YYYYMMDD with no spaces or any other separator (i.e. it is a (partial) timestamp). The template takes care of the formatting, but it must be entered as such.
* ''issues''
** If the task is NOT Done, a list of issues that are preventing the task to be accomplished, either as links to tiddlers or simple words (e. g. "Lacking time")

!! Results
A task partially or completely done, will have a list of results displayed, linking to all the tiddlers tagged "Result" that link kback to that Task
